title: Baby Cry Detection (Studio Accelerator)
description: Use a microphone to detect if a baby is crying in the vicinity
long_description: This Studio Accelerator allows you to build a baby cry detector that can be used on any supported (Infineon) MCU with a microphone for smart home and baby monitoring applications.
